parameters.name: BaselineItemKeyList
parameters.description: The keys of baseline check items.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: Operation
parameters.description:
The operation that you want to perform on the check items. Valid values:

*   **add**: adds the check items to the whitelist
*   **del**: removes the check items from the whitelist

parameters.name: ScanRange
parameters.description: The types of the assets that you want to scan.
